REPORT ON EFFECT ON PRIVACY OF VETERANS BY USE OF SOCIAL SECURITY NUMBERS TO UNIQUELY IDENTIFY VETERANS. The Secretary of Veterans Affairs must submit a report to Congress within 120 days of the enactment of the Act on the impact of using social security numbers to identify veterans' privacy. The report will detail efforts to transition to safer unique identifiers and integrate them within the Department of Veterans Affairs. The Secretary of Veterans Affairs must report to Congress on transitioning to safer unique identifiers for veterans' privacy, including actions taken and future plans to protect their privacy.
